## CredentialManager.createSSOCredentials() method

Creates a set of SSO authentication credentials using the specified input data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createSSOCredentials(inputs?: SSOCredentialsInput): SsoAuthInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inputs | [SSOCredentialsInput](./foundation-comms.ssocredentialsinput.md) | _(Optional)_ The custom input data to use when creating the credentials, if any. |

**Returns:**

[SsoAuthInfo](./foundation-comms.ssoauthinfo.md)

A set of SSO authentication credentials.
